original_text: But every one of the Israelites went down to the Philistines to sharpen his plowshare, his mattock, his axe, or his sickle,
korean_text: 온 이스라엘 사람들이 각기 보습이나 삽이나 도끼나 괭이를 벼리려면 블레셋 사람들에게로 내려갔었는데

sentences.original_text: But every one of the Israelites went down
to sharpen his plowshare, his mattock, his axe, or his sickle
sentences.korean_translation: 자기의 쟁기, 곡괭이, 도끼, 또는 낫을 갈기 위해
